page.title: 02A JOURNEY TO SCHOOL
page.content: I live at 31 Warren Park, Hove Edge.When I leave my house I meet Tracey and Kimberley.We walk down my drive and turn right, then walk along Warren Park, passing 30 houses and a football ground. The houses are made of bricks. At the end we turn right along Green Lane.We pass several houses, some of which are made of brick, and some of stone. We cross over and turn left to walk up Spout House Lane, passing two houses, one of which is made of stone, the other of brick. We also pass Scruples, the hairdressers, on the other side of the road. We then turn onto Upper Green Lane,where our school is.
